text: objects in the system can publish "claims" and "wishes", which are kind of like a generalized interface

elements.text: objects in the system can publish "claims" and "wishes", which are kind of like a generalized interface

text: any object can read any claims and wishes of any other object in the room

elements.text: any object can read any claims and wishes of any other object in the room

text: this was meant to make an ecosystem where one object didn't need to know a specialized "API" to communicate with other objects

elements.text: this was meant to make an ecosystem where one object didn't need to know a specialized "API" to communicate with other objects

text: as Alan Kay quotes Licklider, this is the "communicating with aliens" problem — how do two entities with no known shared context figure out how to talk to each other

elements.text: as Alan Kay quotes Licklider, this is the "communicating with aliens" problem — how do two entities with no known shared context figure out how to talk to each other

text: this was Licklider's vision of the internet, an ecosystem more like how biological organisms talk with each other

elements.text: this was Licklider's vision of the internet, an ecosystem more like how biological organisms talk with each other

text: Bret Victor described a system kind of like this in Magic Ink: <http://worrydream.com/MagicInk/#engineering_inference_from_the_environment>

elements.text: Bret Victor described a system kind of like this in Magic Ink:

text: The claims and wishes system is genius and is meant to be a system that supports programs and humans interacting all together in one abstraction

elements.text: The claims and wishes system is genius and is meant to be a system that supports programs and humans interacting all together in one abstraction

text: "claims" being facts about the world, like measurements or data, and "wishes" being how a human or program would like the world to be (with other programs free to interpret act on that wish and make it true if they have the ability)
